name: hm07
effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A powerful charge attack. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
